description: Avensia AB engages in the provision of digital trading solutions. The company is headquartered in Lund, Skane and currently employs 296 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2000-06-15. The firm delivers solutions ranging from consulting and development to complete system implementation. The company operates within .NET-technology for e-commerce, content management systems and product information management, among others. The firm's product portfolio comprises Apptus eSales, Avensia PDF generator, inRiver PIM and Avensia Storefront, among others. Apptus eSales is a self-optimizing system for consumer data acquisition and analysis. Avensia PDF generator is a technical datasheet creation and management tool. InRiver RIM is a product information management system for assortment control. Avensia Storefront is an unified echo system for sales channel integration, information administration and rendering.
naics: Computer Systems Design and Related Services
name: Avensia AB
